headline: Halliburton First Quarter 2025 Earnings Conference Call
summary: HOUSTON, March 20, 2025--Halliburton Company (NYSE: HAL) will host a conference call on Tuesday, April 22, 2025, to discuss its first quarter 2025 financial results. The call will begin at 8:00 a.m. CT (9:00 a.m. ET).

headline: Halliburton's Struggles Continue: Why the Stock Remains a Sell
summary: HAL's reliance on North America has become a liability as industry conditions deteriorate.
